price: Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti “Mu by’ukuri njye mbaburira nshingiye ku byo mbanahishuriwe (na Allah). Ariko ibipfamatwi iyo biburirwa ntibyumva.”
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أُنذِرُكُم بِٱلۡوَحۡيِۚ وَلَا يَسۡمَعُ ٱلصُّمُّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا مَا يُنذَرُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qul innamā undhirukum bil-waḥyi walā yasmaʿu al-ṣumu al-duʿāa idhā mā yundharūna
